info.title: OSM features API
info.description: The OSM Features API provides a comprehensive suite of endpoints for accessing OpenStreetMap (OSM) features in GeoJSON format, designed to streamline the integration and utilization of OSM data in applications. By leveraging daily syncs from the OSM database through osm2pgsql imports, the API ensures the delivery of up-to-date and efficiently processed data. Endpoints include retrieving lists and specific details of Places, Administrative Areas, Hiking Routes, and Poles, each identifiable by unique osmfeatures IDs and accompanied by their latest update timestamps. The API allows for fetching single items or lists, providing data in GeoJSON format. Every endpoint is provided with detailed descriptions, parameters and responses.

get.description: Returns a list of Admin Areas with their details. Optionally, provide an 'updated_at' and bbox parameter to filter areas. Paginated results are available, with each page containing 100 areas. Use the 'page' parameter to specify the page number to retrieve.

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Admin Area updated after this date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. Each page contains 100 results.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Bounding box to filter Admin Areas by.

parameters.name: admin_level
parameters.description: Administrative level of the area.

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Admin areas that have score greater than or equal to the specified value. Max score is 4.

updated_at.description: When the admin area was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format.

get.summary: Get Admin Area by Osmfeatures ID
get.description: Returns a single Admin Area in GeoJSON format

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Admin Area Osmfeatures ID

osm_type.description: Type of the OSM object (N, W, R)

updated_at.description: When the area was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format.

osm_url.description: URL to the Openstreetmap corresponding feature.

osm_api.description: URL to the OSM API for the object

wikimedia_commons.description: Wikimedia Commons link for the area

geometry.description: Geometry of the area in GeoJSON format

get.description: Returns a list of Places with their IDs and updated timestamps. Optionally provide an 'updated_at' and bbox parameter to filter places. Paginated results are available, with each page containing 100 places. Use the 'page' parameter to specify the page number to retrieve.

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Places updated after this date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. Each page contains 100 results.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Bounding box to filter Places by.

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Places that have score greater than or equal to the specified value. Max score is 5.

updated_at.description: When the place was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format.

get.description: Returns a single Place in GeoJSON format

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Place Osmfeatures ID

osm_type.description: Type of the OSM object (N, W, R)

updated_at.description: When the place was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format.

elevation.description: Elevation of the place in meters

osm_url.description: URL to the Openstreetmap corresponding feature.

osm_api.description: URL to the OSM API for the object

wikimedia_commons.description: Wikimedia Commons link for the place

geometry.description: Geometry of the place in GeoJSON format

get.description: Returns a list of Hiking Routes with their details. Optionally, provide an 'updated_at'and bbox parameter to filter routes. Paginated results are available, with each page containing 100 routes. Use the 'page' parameter to specify the page number to retrieve.

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Hiking Routes updated after this date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. Each page contains 100 results

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Bounding box to filter Hiking Routes by.

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Hiking Routes that have score greater than or equal to the specified value. Max score is 8.

id.description: Osmfeatures ID of the hiking route

updated_at.description: When the hiking route was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format.

get.summary: Get Hiking Routes by Osmfeatures ID
get.description: Returns a single Hiking Route in GeoJSON format

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Hiking Route Osmfeatures ID

200.description: Return the Geojson Feature of the Hiking Route

osm_type.description: Type of the OSM object (N, W, R)

updated_at_osm.description: When the route was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format

updated_at.description: When the route was last updated in osmfeatures, in ISO 8601 format. This data is computed by calculating the most recent updated_at of the members hiking route

cai_scale.description: Difficulty level 'E' indicating easy trails suitable for most hikers.

osm2cai_status.description: Score calculated based on cai survey and cai scale presence in osm tags. If both are present, the score is 3. If only Cai Survey is present, the score is 2. If only Cai Scale is present, the score is 1. If neither are present, the score is 0.

osmc_symbol.description: OSMC symbol showing trail marking colors and number.

network.description: Part of the local walking network.

survey_date.description: Date when the trail survey was conducted.

roundtrip.description: Indicates if the route is a roundtrip.

symbol.description: Symbol used to mark the trail.

ascent.description: Total ascent of the trail in meters.

descent.description: Total descent of the trail in meters.

distance.description: Length of the trail in kilometers.

duration_forward.description: Estimated time to complete the trail forward.

duration_backward.description: Estimated time to complete the trail backward.

rwn_name.description: Name in the regional walking network.

ref_REI.description: Reference number in the Italian Excursionist Network.

state.description: Current condition or status of the trail.

source.description: Trail information obtained from CAI survey.

note_it.description: Notes in Italian regarding the trail.

old_ref.description: Previous reference number of the trail.

note_project_page.description: Project page notes related to the trail.

website.description: Website with more information about the trail.

wikimedia_commons.description: Wikimedia Commons link for the trail.

description_it.description: Description of the trail in Italian.

members.description: Data about trail members or segments.

members_ids.description: Comma separated list of member ids.

osm_url.description: URL to the Openstreetmap corresponding feature.

osm_api.description: URL to the OSM API for the object

wikidata.description: Wikidata link for the hiking route

wikipedia.description: Wikipedia link for the hiking route

geometry.description: Geometry of the area in GeoJSON format

get.description: Returns a list of Poles with their IDs and updated timestamps. Optionally provide an 'updated_at' and bbox parameter to filter poles. Paginated results are available, with each page containing 100 poles. Use the 'page' parameter to specify the page number to retrieve.

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Poles updated after this date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve. Each page contains 100 results.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Bounding box to filter Poles by.

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Poles that have score greater than or equal to the specified value. Max score is 5.

updated_at.description: When the pole was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format.

get.description: Returns a single Pole in GeoJSON format

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Pole osmfeatures ID

osm_type.description: Type of the OSM object (N, W, R)

updated_at.description: When the pole was last updated in OSM, in ISO 8601 format.

ele.description: Elevation of the pole in meters

osm_url.description: URL to the Openstreetmap corresponding feature.

osm_api.description: URL to the OSM API for the object

wikimedia_commons.description: Wikimedia Commons link for the pole

geometry.description: Geometry of the pole in GeoJSON format
